mapper.select: select a.id,a.asset_code,a.asset_name,a.asset_specifications, a.asset_unit,a.asset_price,a.remark,a.create_user,a.create_time, a.create_way,a.update_user,a.update_time, a.status,a.classify_id, ac.classify_name from asset a left join asset_classify ac on a.classify_id = ac.classify_id where a.asset_del = '0' and a.id = #{id}
select picture_path from asset_picture where asset_code = #{assetCode}
mapper.insert: insert into asset( asset_code, asset_name, asset_specifications, asset_unit, classify_id, asset_price, remark, create_user, create_way, update_user, update_time, status, asset_del, create_time )values ( #{assetCode}, #{assetName}, #{assetSpecifications}, #{assetUnit}, #{classifyId}, #{assetPrice}, #{remark}, #{createUser}, #{createWay}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{assetDel}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update asset set asset_del = '1' where id = #{id}
